Metadata.title: Habibi Ahmad | Web Developer Portfolio
Metadata.description: Habibi Ahmad's portfolio, a Web Developer focused on building modern websites using Next.js, React, and modern web technologies. Explore my projects, skills, and experience.

openGraph.title: Habibi Ahmad | Web Developer
openGraph.description: Explore the professional portfolio of Habibi Ahmad, a passionate Web Developer specializing in Frontend and Backend development. Discover real-world projects, technical skills, and experience in building modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications using technologies such as Next.js, React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Firebase, and REST APIs. Learn about his development approach, problem-solving mindset, and journey as a software developer focused on clean code, scalability, and user experience.

twitter.description: Explore the professional portfolio of Habibi Ahmad, a passionate Web Developer specializing in Frontend and Backend development. Discover real-world projects, technical skills, and experience in building modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications using technologies such as Next.js, React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Firebase, and REST APIs. Learn about his development approach, problem-solving mindset, and journey as a software developer focused on clean code, scalability, and user experience.

about.description1: I am a Web Developer and a student at SMKN 1 Karawang with a strong passion for building modern digital solutions.
about.description2: Skilled in various programming languages and popular frameworks, with experience in both frontend and backend projects.
about.description3: I am always motivated to learn new technologies and deliver impactful solutions.

service.description1: A complete solution for modern web development needs with cutting-edge technology and stunning designs.

educations.description1: My career and educational journey shaped my expertise in technology and development.
